FuncDef: This command defines the enforced aggregate rate for all queues associated with the agg-rate context. A rate must be specified for the agg-rate context to be considered to be active on the context s object (SAP, subscriber, Vport, and so on).

ParaDef.Info: The enforced aggregate rate for all queues associated with the agg-rate context, in kilobits per second. Values-1 to 3200000000 | max.
